publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Song of Songs 8
ab.l: T́uv́š́uŕadir jalbarmaḥ Jiśraʾeĺ alnynda ḱuč́ĺu T́eńriniń ajtadoɣoč kim b́erśajedi śeni qarandašny kibik maja öḿuv́č́u t́oš́ĺariń anamnyn tapḥa ėdim śeni tyšḥaryda ki oldur jeri galutnun öpḱa ėdim da ḥor ėt- ḿaǵa ėdiĺar ḿeni.

Ḱond́arǵa ėdim śeni da keĺtirǵa ėdim
üv́uńa anamnyn üvŕat́ḱa ėdij ḿeni ičirǵa ėdim saja ol ijiśli vinadan qyzyl vinasyndan narlarymnyn.
Son qolu bašym t́ub́u- ńa da on qolu kučup tuttu ḿeni.
Ant ėt́tiŕamiń siźni qyzlary Jerušalajimniń ńe ojatyrsyz da ńe qozɣarsyz śuv́arligiń T́eńriniń ńegińč́a ki öźu kĺagij.
Da ńe vaḥtta čyḥsa Jiśraʾeĺ galuttan ajtylyr kim bu keĺadir ol midbardan öźaĺańadir śüv́arińa ol almalyḥ t́ub́uńa ojattym śeni anda tolɣatty śeni ańe anda tolɣatty t́oŕadi śeni.

Qojɣun ḿeni mohornu kibik üŕagij üśt́uńa qojɣun ḿeni mohornu kibik biĺagij üśt́uńa ki ḱuč́ĺud́ur öĺum kibik śuv́arlik qatydyr ǵor kibik ḱuńuĺuk učḥunlary anyn učḥun- lary kibik ullu jalynly otnun.
Ḱop suvlar bolalmaslar śońd́ur- ḿa ol śuv́arlikni da öźańĺar taštyrmaslar any ėǵer b́erśajdi kiši bar malyn üv́uńuń śuv́arlik üč́uń ḥor ėt́ḿa ḥor ėt́ḱa ėdiĺar any.
Siĺli biźǵa kiči da t́uš́ĺar joḥtur anar ńe qylajyḥ siĺlimiź- ǵa ol vaḥtta ki śoźĺańśa anyn üč́uń.
Ėǵer qala bolsejdir ol qondarɣan ėdik anyn üśt́uńa ḱuḿuš́ saraj da ėǵer ėšik bolsejdir ol tuǯurɣan ėdik anyn üśt́uńa taḥtasyn ėreźniń.
Ḿeń qala bolsejdim da t́oš́ĺarim v́ežalar kibik anda bolɣejdim ėnaj atlarynda tabuvču kibik bazlyḥny.
Baḥča ėdi Šelomoɣa Baʿal Hamonda da b́erdi ol baḥčany abravčularɣa har birisi keĺtiri- redi jemiši üč́uń miń ḱuḿuš́.
Baḥčam ki ḿenim alnymda ol miń saja Šelomo da ėki juź saqlavčularɣa jemišiń.

Ol olturuvču baɣlarda
joldašlar qulaḥ saldyrlar avazyjny ėšit́tirgiń biźǵa.

Kačḥyn śuv́arim da ušaɣyn öźuja jurǵa hem soɣaɣyna ol oĺeńĺarniń tavlary üśtüńa ol otjamlarnyn. בְּרַח דֹּודִי וּדְמֵה לְךָ
לִצְבִי אֹו לְעֹפֶר הָאַיָלִים עַל בְשָמִים׃ שְאוּ יְדֶיכֶם קֹדֶש וּכַרְבן אֶת יְהֹוָה

app.note: Heb. SoS 8.14 followed by Heb. ‘Fold your hands and bow before YHWH’.
